questionText: What is the primary purpose of the ID pointer technique in Move?

answerOptions.answerText: To optimize the performance of Move modules.
To encrypt data within Move objects.
To link accessors or capabilities back to the original object, separating data from its accessors.

questionText: Which of the following is an application of the ID pointer pattern in Move?

answerOptions.answerText: Implementing transferable capabilities for shared objects.
